document_data.name: Mercer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mercer''' was the chamberlain of [[Lady Jannath's Estate]] in the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|Why does [[Tarhun Mnemonis|Tarhun]] hire such people? They're clearly incorrigible.|Mercer}}
document_data.Description: Chamberlain Mercer was an aged [[rock gnome]] man with a light skin tone, dark eyes, and black curly hair. He wore a fanciful set of embroidered clothes and a top hat â€“ a chamberlain's uniform of the Jannath Estate.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Mister Mercer was in charge of the help that served Lady [[Firelia Jannath]] in her mansion. When her new husband fell victim of a [[ghost]]ly possession, Mercer dismissed all servants from the mansion on the mistress's orders, leaving only her loyal butler Tarhun Mnemonis standing guard of the mansion's main entrance. Mercer placed [[Furbleston]], [[Bailey]], [[Cyrilla]], [[Jooli]], [[Phubbs]], and Chef [[Marjoram (chef)|Marjoram]] on temporary leave with the pay of half-wages and allowance to seek temporary employment somewhere else. The chamberlain issued a statement that this dismissal was done at no imputation of malfeasance and would be ended upon notice.
